DOC.brief_summary: The investigators hypothesized that consuming isolated yellow pea fibre or protein, alone to together, as part of a high-carbohydrate pasta meal, would reduce the blood glucose response to the meal compared to a meal without yellow pea components and reduce food intake at a meal served 2 hours later.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Yellow Pea Protein and Fibre Added to a High-carb Meal on Glycemic Response and Food Intake
